text: @Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse Mr. Vice President, the attention paid to #COVID19 is at a fever pitch. Is it warranted? Do you feel that some elements in our country have crossed the line in terms of respecting the potential danger of this disease into an inappropriate level of paranoia?
